Cookbook: Testing and using
[Cookbook: How to build a IPDR Exporter]

The IPDR transmitter (client) API comes with full source code and with sample programs that use it.

When deploying a system, debug log messages can be turned on by calling IPDR_SetModuleMoreDebugLevel(). These can also be set by commands at the console.

Various statistis are output at intervals defined by configuration.statisticsInterval.

If the console is enabled (configuration.console.consolePort (default port 40000) and (configuration.console.consolePassword), you can use ordinary telnet to connect to the transmitter (client) and issue various configuration and analysis commands. This is also a good way of verifying the version of the deployed code, by using the "version" command"

If the network element has no "console" output, you can direct the syslog output can be directed to any IP address using configuration.logging.loggerAddress and configuration.logging.loggerPort.
